short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Web highlighter to support reading on web.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🎉 Need a AI sidekick to help you spot the good stuff on web pages? Look no further! Our GPT Web Highlighter is here to be your trusty buddy in the web browsing adventure! 

🎉 Modes of Mayhem:
  ⭐️Off Mode: When you need a break, turn off the highlighter and give your eyes a rest. We won't judge; even superheroes need their downtime.

  ⭐️Automatic Mode: It's like having a cheeky sidekick! Let our genius algorithm do the detective work and highlight the good stuff automatically. Sit back and enjoy the show.

  ⭐️Manual Mode: Be the boss! Click our "Abracadabra" button, and boom, you're in control. Highlight the web page's secrets with your magical touch.
